actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to establish a program for radio broadcasting to the peoples of Asia.

summary.text: Radio Free Asia Act of 1992 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to grant authority to the Board for International Broadcasting to operate a Radio Free Asia broadcasting service for the peoples of Southeast Asia. Revises the composition of the Board to add two additional members. Allows funds made available to Radio Free Europe and Radio Liberty to be used by Radio Free Asia. Authorizes appropriations. Requires the Board to report to the Congress on the desirability of the geographic expansion of funded broadcasts, particularly to Africa, the Middle East, and North Korea.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to establish a program for radio broadcasting to the peoples of Asia.
